MPSCNNNeuronExponential(3) MetalPerformanceShaders.framework MPSCNNNeuronExponential(3)

NAME

MPSCNNNeuronExponential

SYNOPSIS

#import <MPSCNNNeuron.h>

Inherits MPSCNNNeuron.

Instance Methods


(nonnull instancetype) - initWithDevice:a:b:c:
(nonnull instancetype) - initWithDevice:

Additional Inherited Members

Detailed Description

This depends on Metal.framework. Specifies the Exponential neuron filter. For each pixel, applies the following function: f(x) = c ^ (a * x + b).

If the value of c is -1.0f, the base (c) is set to e.

Method Documentation

- (nonnull instancetype) initWithDevice: (nonnull id< MTLDevice >) device

Standard init with default properties per filter type

Parameters:

device The device that the filter will be used on. May not be NULL.

Returns:

A pointer to the newly initialized object. This will fail, returning nil if the device is not supported. Devices must be MTLFeatureSet_iOS_GPUFamily2_v1 or later.

Reimplemented from MPSCNNNeuron.

- (nonnull instancetype) initWithDevice: (nonnull id< MTLDevice >) device(float) a(float) b(float) c

Initialize a Exponential neuron filter.

Parameters:

device The device the filter will run on.
a Filter property 'a'. See class discussion.
b Filter property 'b'. See class discussion.
c Filter property 'c'. See class discussion.

Returns:

A valid MPSCNNNeuronExponential object or nil, if failure.
